mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.DEPT_NAME, C.JOB_NAME, D.CHANGE_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE A LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON A.DEPT_CODE = B.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN JOB C ON A.JOB_CODE = C.JOB_CODE LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT D ON A.FILE_NO = D.FILE_NO WHERE A.ID = #{id} AND A.STATUS != 'Q'

mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET NAME = #{name}, DEPT_CODE = #{dept_code}, JOB_CODE = #{job_code}, BIRTH = #{birth}, PHONE = #{phone}, EMAIL = #{email}, JOIN_DATE = #{join_date}, FILE_NO = #{file_no} WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no}
